main.aboutusdesc: IGeneral Store iyisikhungo sesitolo sazo zonke izitolo zeGeneral Store emhlabeni jikelele ezibandakanya abasabalalisi abakhethekile bemikhiqizo eyaziwayo.
main.subscribedesc: Sicela ufake i-imeyili yakho uma ufuna ukuthola izindaba zakamuva ezivela kithi.

section1.sDesc1: Lapha kuphela lapho ungathola khona izinzuzo eziningi, okulula ukujoyina, okungcono kakhulu kokunikezela ngemikhiqizo nezinye izinzuzo ezahlukahlukene

item.descItem2: Ayikhokhisi noma yiziphi izimali lapho uthola isipho.

banner1.bDesc1: Uma ubhalisile, hlola i-imeyili yakho ngezikhathi ezithile ukuthola imininingwane yakamuva evela kithi. Sizokhipha nezaphulelo zokuthenga esitolo sethu mahhala. Ulindeni! Qalisa

section2.sDesc2: Khetha isipho osithandayo, futhi ungabamba iqhaza kukho konke ukunikezwa ohlwini esikuhlinzeka ngezansi.

banner2.bDesc2: Ngokuzibhalisa kuphela lapho ungabamba iqhaza ekunikezelweni kwethu. Ulindeni! ake Sizibhalise manje.

section3.sDesc3: Thola i-GiveAway yamahhala ngamahora angaphansi kwama-24! Ungaphuthelwa yileli thuba elingandile, kulula kakhulu, vele ubhalise kuwebhusayithi yethu bese wenza inhlolovo (uma ikhona), awudingi ukukhokha noma yini. Halala!

step1.ssDesc11: Ukuze uthole ithuba lokuwina i- %s, okudingeka ukwenze ukugcwalisa ifomu lokubhalisa le-akhawunti yakho. Ukuze uqalise, vele ufake umncintiswano ngekheli lakho le-imeyili.

step2.ssDesc21: Uma usungenile ngemvume, uzoba nethuba lokuthola okunye okufakiwe ngokugcwalisa izenzo ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ukuvakashela iziteshi zethu zokuxhumana.
step2.ssDesc22: Unelungelo lokuqedela izenzo eziningi ngendlela othanda ngayo, isenzo ngasinye sinikeza inani elihlukile lokufakiwe futhi okufakwayo ngakunye kungaphumelela.

step3.ssDesc31: Kwenziwe. Sizokuthinta ngokushesha ngokuya ngothintana naye ogcwaliswe ngesikhathi sokubhaliswa kusayithi lethu.

banner3.bDesc3: Lo mcimbi unikeza izindawo zokuwina eziningi kunangonyaka odlule. Mema abangani bakho nomndeni wakho ngamathuba amakhulu nakakhulu. Bhalisa manje ngaphambi kokuqala kwalo mcimbi.

theWinner.coment1: Ngiyabonga ngeCash, ngiyethemba isitolo sakho sizogcwala kakhulu.
theWinner.coment2: Lesi ngempela isitolo esidumile seGeneralStore, iphakethe liphumelele engilitholile, uMkhiqizo ungowokuqala, futhi angizange ngikhokhe mali. Ngiyabonga.
theWinner.coment3: Ekuqaleni angizange ngikholwe, kepha ngemuva kokuthi ngibathintile kwavela ukuthi yiGeneralStore. ngiyabonga iGeneralStore nge %s.
theWinner.coment4: Ngiyabonga unkulunkulu ngokukhulisa inhlanhla yami, ngiyabonga ngokunikela, iGeneralStore ngiyayithanda.

section5.dSupport1: Inkampani yezobuchwepheshe yamazwe omhlaba yaseMelika ezinze eSeattle, eWashington, egxile ku-e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and intelligence intelligence.
section5.dSupport2: Umthengisi we-inthanethi waseMelika othengisa ikakhulukazi ifenisha ekomkhulu lakhe eMidvale, e-Utah, ngaseSalt Lake City. UPatrick M. Byrne wasungula i-Overstock.com ngo-1999.
section5.dSupport3: Inkampani yamazwe omhlaba yaseMelika ehweba ngamaketanga, izitolo zezaphulelo, nezitolo ezidayisa ukudla ezivela e-United States, ezinendlunkulu eBentonville, e-Arkansas.
section5.dSupport4: Umthengisi wamakhompiyutha omhlaba wonke waseMelika osendlunkulu eRichfield, eMinnesota. Ekuqaleni yasungulwa nguRichard M. Schulze noJames Wheeler e1966 njengesitolo esikhethekile somsindo esibizwa ngeSound of Music.
section5.dSupport5: Insizakalo yokuthengisa eku-inthanethi ezinze eChina ephethwe yi-Alibaba Group. Yethulwe ngo-2010, yakhiwa ngamabhizinisi amancane eChina nakwezinye izindawo, njengeSingapore, enikeza imikhiqizo kubathengi bamazwe aphesheya online.
section5.dSupport6: Inhlangano yezentengiselwano yamazwe omhlaba yaseMelika ezinze eSan Jose, eCalifornia, eyenza ukuthengiswa komthengi nomthengi nokuthengiswa kwebhizinisi nomthengi ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yayo.

section6.sDesc6: Uma unanoma yimiphi imibuzo mayelana nomkhiqizo, noma olunye ulwazi oludingayo, sicela ungangabazi ukuxhumana nathi.
section6.subject: Isihloko
